description.narrative: Finansiering av Rural Energy Fund hanterad av Rural Energy Agency för ökad tillgång till moderna energitjänster (t ex elektricitet)på landsbygden i Tanzania för hållbar socio-ekonomisk utveckling fattigdomsbekämpning.

Providing funds to the Rural Energy Fund managed by the Rural Energy Agency for increased access to modern energy services in rural Mainland Tanzania for sustainable socio-economic development and poverty alleviation

sector.narrative: Electric power transmission and distribution (centralised grids)
